sentences.en: Also Zaller talks a lot about messages that are congruent or discordant with people's underlying predispositions.
sentences.cn: Zaller还说了很多有关和人们的内在倾向是一致或矛盾的讯息.

sentences.en: Discordant findings will require clinical judgment as to further evaluation.
sentences.cn: 这些不同的意见还需要在临床实践中做出进一步的评价.

sentences.en: For when we are deeply mournful discordant above all others is the voice of mirth.
sentences.cn: 因为当我们极度悲伤的时候,欢乐的声音会比其他一切声音都更显得不谐调.

sentences.en: He studied what are known as discordant couples.
sentences.cn: 他研究的对象是所谓的不一致夫妇.

sentences.en: He study studied what are known as discouten the discordant couples.
sentences.cn: 他研究的是被指不协调的夫妻.

sentences.en: His agenda is discordant with ours.
sentences.cn: 他的日程安排和我们的有冲突。

sentences.en: Intend to flush out of your immediate field all non - resonant or discordant frequencies, entities and cords.
sentences.cn: 、意想将所有 非 共振或不协调的频率 、 有和连线从你的能量场中奔涌而出.

sentences.en: Leonato thought they would make a discordant pair.
sentences.cn: 里奥那托认为他们不适宜作夫妻.

sentences.en: Something gave a loud discordant twang.
sentences.cn: 什么东西突然发出了响亮刺耳的“嘣”的一声。

sentences.en: Sometimes our confusion is simply the result of discordant energies of others in our intuitive body.
sentences.cn: 有时候,我们的困惑只是我们直觉体中有来自别人的不共鸣能量的结果.

sentences.en: the chair's modernity struck a discordant note in a room full of eighteenth-century furniture.
sentences.cn: 在满屋子的18世纪家具中，这把充满现代感的椅子很是刺目。

sentences.en: The modern decor strikes a discordant note in this old building.
sentences.cn: 现代化的装潢与这座古老的建筑本身很不协调。

sentences.en: The stories about the booming Chinese consumer market strike a discordant note on one level.
sentences.cn: 一定程度上,有关中国消费市场日益繁荣的报道发出了一种不协调的声音.

sentences.en: The views between us are discordant.
sentences.cn: 我们之间的观点不一致.

sentences.en: Therefore, from late puberty and thereafter , there are strikingly discordant leptin levels between the sexes.
sentences.cn: 因此, 从青春期后期开始,两性间瘦素水平就有了明显差异.

sentences.en: This is about empowering sweetness and love and leaving the discordant and destructive dance behind.
sentences.cn: 这就是为甜美和爱赋予力量,让不和谐与破坏性舞蹈留在身后的内容.

words.tran_cn: 不一致；不调和；冲突；（声音的）不和谐
不和谐的，刺耳的；不一致的

trans.tran_cn: 不和的，不一致的，不调和的，不谐和的
trans.tran_en: a discord-ant sound is unpleasant because it is made up of musical notes that do not go together well
